description: Comprehensive UI/UX analysis of CRUD operations across all 19 frontend modules for consistency and best practices

workstreams.name: Analyze existing CRUD UI patterns across modules
Create standardized CRUD UI pattern recommendations
Design reusable component architecture for CRUD operations
Create accessibility checklist for CRUD operations
Develop design system specifications for CRUD components

decisions.decision: Analyzed 7 representative modules (Threat Intelligence, Incident Response, IoC Management, Vulnerability Management, Compliance, Notifications) covering full range of CRUD pattern maturity
Identified key pattern: dedicated pages for Create/Edit (not modals) - this is a good enterprise pattern for complex forms
Documented 14 critical UX issues including: no confirmation dialogs for delete, no success/error notifications, minimal validation, no accessibility attributes
Recommended React Hook Form + Zod for validation (already in dependencies), Material-UI Snackbar for notifications, dedicated ConfirmationDialog component
Designed 10 reusable components (PageHeader, FormActions, ConfirmationDialog, LoadingState, ErrorState, NotFoundState, EmptyState, FieldDisplay, SkeletonTable, useNotification hook)
Created comprehensive WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility checklist with 100+ checkpoints covering keyboard nav, screen readers, color contrast, form accessibility
Defined complete design system with color palette, typography scales, spacing system, button/chip/table styles aligned with Material-UI
